translations.chinese: 張良曰：「不如 因而立之，使自為守。」
translations.english: Zhang Liang said: "It would be better to take advantage of this and establish him as king, letting him defend it himself."

translations.chinese: 春二月，遣張良操印，立韓信為齊王。
translations.english: In the second month of spring, he sent Zhang Liang carrying the seal to establish Han Xin as King of Qi.

translations.chinese: 秋七月，立黥布為淮南王。
translations.english: In the seventh month of autumn, he established Ying Bu as King of Huainan.
In the eighth month, he first established poll taxes.

translations.chinese: 北貉、燕人來致梟騎助漢。
translations.english: The Beidi and Yan people came to deliver owl-headed cavalry to assist Han.
